content: socks 4 5 mm dk yarn st used single_crochet for toe half_double_crochet for the rest toe with color a chain 7 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook & in next 4 increase in last chain 5 single_crochet in next 14 increase in last 36 foot from end of row 7-29 measures 6 i wear a size 8 switch to color b continue working in rounds 8-29 half_double_crochet blo around add or omit row to reach length needed heel switch back to color a this part is worked in row lay sock flat and work across back 21 sts ch1 turn at end of each row 30 half_double_crochet blo across back 21 sts 21 31 44 single_crochet around 36 45 crab st around 36 sew in ends and enjoy your new cozy warm socks
